content: cute wrap style from pierrot sweet scallops along the edges and waist tie could be used as either skirt or apron both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** **materials ** * japanese size 3/0 & 5/0 crochet hooks 2 3 & 3 0mm * 160g 600m color a * 80g 300m color b * 2 snaps 10mm diameter skirt is worked flat flower motif worked in the round 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/amikomoumeharu-6/
